CustomField.description: Has your company, any person listed above , any of your company affiliates , any officer, director or owner of your company's affiliates, or anyone working on behalf of your Company, ever been convicted, fined, indicted or charged in a criminal or regulatory proceeding including any related to bribery or corruption?

CustomField.label: Convicted with Bribery/Corruption?
